_comment: This config makes the local AI model MUCH smarter about YOUR cluster!
_instructions: 1. Copy: cp skube-config.example.json skube-config.json  2. Customize below  3. Run: skube config-ai skube-config.json
_provider_options: ollama (free, local) or openai (requires API key)
common_apps._tip: Add your actual app/deployment names - helps AI recognize typos and partial names
namespaces._tip: List your actual namespaces - helps AI recognize and fix typos
app_patterns._tip: Describe YOUR naming conventions - helps AI understand your cluster's patterns
app_patterns._example3: All apps have 'app' label matching deployment name

custom_hints._tip: Add any cluster-specific context that helps AI understand your commands
custom_hints._example_naming: We use hyphens between words, not underscores or spaces
custom_hints._example_labels: When user asks about 'labels', they usually want to see deployments
